usage.title: How to use?
usage.subtitle: Record and edit your content in no time
usage.startup: When the app starts, click on the Recorder button.
usage.record: A punctured window will appear, line up to what you want to record and click on Record. When finished, click on the Stop button.
usage.edit-remove: Remove unwanted frames by selecting them with Shift-Click and pressing Delete.
usage.edit-transition: Add a transition to the last frame, so the animation loops more smoothly.
usage.edit-save: After your touch ups, click on Save As to export the animation to your format of choice.
usage.final-gif: Here's the result Gif, around 80.6 KB.

gallery.editor: This is the editor, where you can edit your recordings and export it to gif or video.

share.text: ScreenToGif is a screen, webcam and sketchboard recorder with an integrated editor.
